General.Name: Guangdong Songfa Ceramics Co
General.Description: Guangdong Songfa Ceramics Co.,Ltd. designs, produces, and sells ceramic products worldwide. The company offers resin products, ceramic pigments, packaging products, sanitary ware, gifts, handicrafts, daily necessities, porcelain clay, enamel and iron products, table clocks, stainless steel, aluminum, mango, wood products and other ceramic related accessories, such as rattan, bamboo, wood, cloth, wax, glass, plastic, hardware, stainless steel, electrical appliances, and plumbing devices. It also engages in the wholesale and retail of leather and leather products, daily utensils and groceries, kitchen equipment and supplies, textiles, knitwear, ceramics, glassware, household appliances, furniture, daily necessities, and raw materials; retail of ceramic decoration materials; and Internet commodity retail. In addition, the company provides ceramic matching products for lamps, rattan, bamboo, wood, cloth, wax, and packaging; conference and exhibition services; technology development, technology transfer, technology consulting, and technical services; computer system integration; computer technology research and experimental development; technical promotion services; sales of hotel supplies, ceramic products, handicrafts, and furniture; undertaking exhibitions; enterprise management; import and export of goods, technology import and export, agency import and export; and economic information consultation. Further, it offers entrusted management of equity investment funds; equity investment; equity investment management; investment consulting services; and investment management services. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Chaozhou, China.
